verbose_text: Epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) is said to mediate tumor formation and progression pathways intracellularly, via ras activated mitogen activated protein kinase, phosphatidylinositol 3-kinase/AKT, and phospholipase C pathways that modulate cell motility, adhesion, and proliferation 44.
evidence: phospholipase C pathways that modulate cell motility, adhesion, and proliferation
